title: Mini Chocolate Cakes with Salted Caramel Sauce
ingredients: ['For the mini chocolate cakes', '250g dark chocolate, melted', '150g butter, softened', '100g caster sugar', '3 eggs', '100g plain flour', 'For the caramel sauce', '150g caster sugar', '1 tablespoon water', '50g salted butter, cut into pieces and softened', '75ml cream', 'pinch of coarse sea salt']
